channel.title: Aurora Warms the Night
channel.description: Posts from Aurora Warms the Night

item.title: This Thursday Aug 20th we are in need of a to go meal for 50...
item.content:encoded:
Aurora Warms the Night

This Thursday Aug 20th we are in need of a to go meal for 50 people. Please visit https://mealtrain.com/58ozoy for more details, to sign up, or to see all of our available dates.

A special thanks to all of our volunteers who have continued to support us during this difficult time of outreach. We are so thankful for each of you & the folks we serve are forever grateful!

This meal sign up is a little different than originally intended. We don't have our shower trailer up & running yet due to COVID, but we are continuing to provide meals to our friends on Colfax in a manner that is similar to take out. We are in need of meals packed in single serving to-go bags/boxes...

item.title: We are in need of To-Go Meals on Monday & Thursday evenings....
item.content:encoded:
Aurora Warms the Night is feeling thankful.

We are in need of To-Go Meals on Monday & Thursday evenings. If you can put together 40-50 sack meals please follow the link & choose an evening. The meals are dropped off at the office & our staff takes them out to our friends on Colfax. Thanks for partnering with us. https://mealtrain.com/58ozoy

This meal sign up is a little different than originally intended. We don't have our shower trailer up & running yet due to COVID, but we are continuing to provide meals to our friends on Colfax in a manner that is similar to take out. We are in need of meals packed in single serving to-go bags/boxes...

item.title: We still have some openings for summer lunches. We need 50-100...
item.content:encoded:
Aurora Warms the Night

We still have some openings for summer lunches. We need 50-100 sack lunches to handout Monday through Friday until July 10th. You don't have to serve them just prepare them & drop them off. Visit https://mealtrain.com/0484y9 to pick your date.

Thank-you so much for your support of Summer Lunches. If you have been involved in previous years you will notice that this year we are doing things a little different in the realm of COVID-19. This year all meals will be "to-go" style.

mealtrain.com

item.title: The box of material has been picked up....I have a box of random...
item.content:encoded:
Aurora Warms the Night

The box of material has been picked up....I have a box of random material. If any of our supporters on here are making masks & would like it I’d love to donate it to you. PS We are always in need of masculine masks as well!!
Unfortunately I don’t have any elastic.
Shoot me an email at volunteers@awtnco.org
item.author: Aurora Warms the Night

item.title: It's Giving Tuesday! A day to financially support...
item.content:encoded:
Aurora Warms the Night

It's Giving Tuesday! A day to financially support nonprofits as we continue to serve our communities. Please take a moment to visit https://www.coloradogives.org/index.php… & make a donation that will make a difference in the lives of those experiencing homelessness here in Aurora.
item.author: Aurora Warms the Night

item.title: When you mom works for a non-profit you might spend part of your...
item.content:encoded:
Aurora Warms the Night

When you mom works for a non-profit you might spend part of your afternoon constructing 125 street food kits 😝
A huge thank you to everyone who has been ordering items online & mailing them to us!!

item.title: We're still doing our twice a week meals...slightly...
item.content:encoded:
Aurora Warms the Night

We're still doing our twice a week meals...slightly different but still consistent. We could really use your help making to-go meals over the next month or two. Many hand make less work!

This meal sign up is a little different than originally intended. We don't have our shower trailer up & running yet due to COVID, but we are continuing to provide meals to our friends on Colfax in a manner that is similar to take out. We are in need of meals packed in single serving to-go bags/boxes...

item.title: We are loving this collaboration effort with The Salvation Army...
item.content:encoded:
Aurora Warms the Night

We are loving this collaboration effort with The Salvation Army & Aurora Mental Health.

The Salvation Army-Aurora

The ￼ collaborative street outreach team serving those experiencing homelessness. We are out on Monday and Thursdays at three locations along Colfax. (Two of t...hose are on the Adams County side.) Aurora Warms the Night offers hygiene products, street food kits, socks, and water.

Aurora Mental Health Center, Pathway to Home program case managers, offer new clients intake and the opportunity to access their program. They are also giving current clients follow up and resources. This collaboration allows for proper social distancing and care for those who need it most.
#COVID19 #somegoodnews #FightforGood #teamTSAAurora #collaboration

See More
item.author: Aurora Warms the Night

item.title: Our office isn't open for donations but that's not...
item.content:encoded:
Aurora Warms the Night is feeling loved.

Our office isn't open for donations but that's not stopping our amazing donors who want to be a part of our mission. These arrived in the mail today as well as some large boxes of granola bars! If you'd like to help us keep serving those experiencing homelessness shoot me an email volunteers@awtnco.org
Thanks for all of your support,
Leah
item.author: Aurora Warms the Night

item.title: Look what we at Aurora Warms the Night are up to. Even though we...
item.content:encoded:
Aurora Warms the Night

Look what we at Aurora Warms the Night are up to. Even though we can't use our shower trailer & serve dinners during this summer season of our outreach we're so excited to partner up with Aurora Mental Health & The Salvation Army. Good things happen when you join forces with other great organizations!!

The Salvation Army-Aurora

Tomorrow we start a partnership between Aurora Warms the Night and Aurora Mental Health Center to provide basic needs, COVID information and assessment and information/referral to folks experiencing homelessness on the Colfax corridor. Keep a look out for the Emergency Disaster Vehicle.
item.author: Aurora Warms the Night

item.title: Aurora Warms the Night is in need of donations. If you would...
item.content:encoded:
Aurora Warms the Night

Aurora Warms the Night is in need of donations. If you would like to be involved with an organization that is actively continuing to support the homeless community during the Stay At Home order please consider a financial donation or review the list below for other items being given out.

DonateAurora Warms the Night is asking for donations.

Donations needed...Our office is currently closed but we are still taking donations at a drop location. We aren't taking clothing as we focus on food & hygiene ...items which are most needed right now. Please refer to the list of items provided. Street Food Kits are our biggest need at the moment. Thanks for partnering with us.

Please take a moment to share this post on your facebook page. Getting the word out about how to be involved is a group effort.

See More
item.author: Aurora Warms the Night

item.author: Aurora Warms the Night

item.title: Hi Everyone. Sorry we've been so quiet over here at AWTN....
item.content:encoded:
Aurora Warms the Night is feeling thankful.

Hi Everyone. Sorry we've been so quiet over here at AWTN. There's lots going on & lots in the works as we charter new waters continuing to serve those in our community who are unhoused.
I'm working on getting a newsletter out to let our community know exactly what we're up to! If you aren't on our mailing list please message me & I'll get you added. We are so thankful for all of you who are checking in to see how you can help from the comfort of your own homes. As always we are overwhelmed by your loving hearts towards the community we serve. Please stay tuned to see how you can get plugged in with AWTN.

Donate
item.author: Aurora Warms the Night

item.title: These 50 bags filled with gloves, hats, socks and hygiene items...
item.content:encoded:
Aurora Warms the Night

These 50 bags filled with gloves, hats, socks and hygiene items came in yesterday from a second grade class at St. Mary’s Academy. The messages from the kids were so inspiring. These were made with lots of love!

+6
item.author: Aurora Warms the Night

item.title: These lowly bags came yesterday with lots of gloves, socks, hats...
item.content:encoded:
Aurora Warms the Night

These lowly bags came yesterday with lots of gloves, socks, hats and hygiene items for our friends! Along with some great messages. Thanks to a Second Grade class at St. Mary’s Academy!

+6

item.title: We are under Cold Weather Activation this week & we need a...
item.content:encoded:
Aurora Warms the Night

We are under Cold Weather Activation this week & we need a meal to go to the Star Motel tomorrow night (Thursday). Please go to our Meal Train site to sign up if you are available to prepare & deliver. If you would like to be added to the list of individuals available to do motel meals please visit our website www.aurorawarmsthenight.org & go to the volunteer page to sign up.
Thanks for partnering with us at AWTN!!

Motel Meal Needed Thursday

mealtrain.com

Meal Train Update for Cold Weather Activation - AWTN

Motel Meal Needed ThursdayMotel Meal Needed Thursday
item.author: Aurora Warms the Night

item.title: Point in Time Survey - WE NEED YOU! Aurora Warms the Night needs...
item.content:encoded:
Aurora Warms the Night

Point in Time Survey - WE NEED YOU!

Aurora Warms the Night needs volunteers to partake in the Point in Time Survey on Jan 27th. Point in Time is a count that is done across the US of all individuals who are experiencing homelessness. It is important for Aurora to have an accurate count for funding of the various nonprofits who serve this population of individuals. The city has asked Aurora Warms the Night to do the count along the colfax corridor. We are aiming to have 12 tea...ms of 3 or 4 people including a friend from the street to do the survey. We will meet at our office on Colfax at 5pm & will be out until 10:30 or 11pm. We are in need of fluent spanish speakers as well.

Anyone who wishes to participate is required to attend an information meeting on Jan 21st or 23rd from 5:30-7pm at the Aurora Municipal Center. The address is 15151 E Alameda Pkwy.
Please let me know if you have any questions. If you are available to join us & attend a training please send an email to Leah at volunteers@awtnco.org (also let me know if you speak spanish!)

See More
item.author: Aurora Warms the Night
